name: facetiousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of not being serious about a serious subject, in an attempt to be funny or to appear clever: He had just the right combination of facetiousness and sincerity. They both have a tendency towards a self-protective facetiousness. See
facetious
More examplesFewer examplesOppositional energy has given way to sarcastic indifference or plain facetiousness.He had just the right combination of facetiousness and sincerity.She straddles the line between earnestness and facetiousness.
